title: LA Dodgers Star Kikรฉ HernรกndezยTrolls Drake During World Series Parade: โOctoberโs VeryยOwnโ
summary: The outfielder also referenced bars from Drizzy & Future's "Big Rings."
body: As if losing a gut-wrenching Game 7 weren’t bad enough for Drake and the Toronto Blue Jays, the hits kept coming during the Los Angeles Dodgers’ World Series parade on Monday. Outfielder Kikรฉ Hernรกndez had some fun at Drake’s expense and took a playful shot at Drizzy when addressing the Dodger Stadium crowd on the mic. “It’s October’s Very Own!” he said, which felt as if he was ripping a WWE promo. Related Drake Supports Hometown Blue Jays at Game 6 of the World Series Justin Bieber Watches as Dodgers Edge Blue Jays in Historic World Series Game Brad Paisley Plays National Anthem Ahead of Another Extra-Innings World Series Game: ‘Is It Your Fault It Went 18 Innings Again?’ Hernรกndez later made a witty reference to lyrics from Drake and Future’s 2015 hit “Big Rings.” “This really big team that has a lot of really big rings,” he said. Kikรฉ Hernรกndez trolling Drake at the Dodgers World Series celebration today: โItโs Octoberโs Very Ownโ โThis really big team that has a lot of really big ringsโ ๐คฃ Drake posted Shohei Ohtani striking out after the Blue Jays went up 3-2 pic.twitter.com/4iUโฆ

title: Ariana Grande Asks โWickedโ Fans Not to โWish Dangerโ on Her After Missing Premiere Due to โSafetyยIssueโ
summary: "we did everything we could and i promise you no one is more upset than i am," the star explained.
body: Ariana Grande is looking for some compassion after she was forced to cancel her trip to Brazil for the Sรฃo Paulo premiere of Wicked: For Good , something she says has led upset fans to wish “danger” upon her and her team. Related ‘Wicked’ Cast Celebrates Jonathan Bailey Being Named Sexiest Man Alive: ‘Look at Those Abs’ Watch Ariana Grande & Cynthia Erivo Go Toe to Toe in First ‘Wicked’ Concert Special Sneak Peek Ariana Grande Wraps Filming ‘Focker In-Law,’ Shares Behind-the-Scenes Photos & Message to Cast In a heartfelt Instagram Story post on Tuesday (Nov. 4), the pop star began by writing, “i can’t believe this is happening and i am beyond devastated to be sending this message.” “a few hours ago, my team and i had to deplane our flight, as they had to do maintenance on the plane due to a safety issue and it will not be taking off until 11am tomorrow which means that i would not be making it in time for the Wicked For Good Sรฃo Paulo premiere,” she continued. “i am so heartbroken that i’m unable to be there with you all. we sincerely tried everything we couโฆ

title: We found a hidden Google Wallet feature that could change the way you commute
summary: You'll be able to select a specific transit payment method that lets you pay for transport without unlocking your phone.
body: Credit: Edgar Cervantes / Android Authority TL;DR Google Wallet is preparing a new โExpress Transit Cardโ feature for faster transport payments. Itโll allow users to set up a separate debit/credit card for transport payments, different from their default tap-to-pay card for regular purchases. Wallet users will be able to make transport payments with their Express Transit Card without needing to unlock their devices. Google appears to be getting ready to add a handy feature called โExpress Transit Cardโ to Google Wallet . The new option will allow users to pay for transport using a specific card, without needing to unlock their phones.
